meta.article_title: January 25, 2021 - Finding Simple Tactics That Work

terminologie_extrait.contexte: I'm a rhythm player - I'm better against a good predictable receive than a weaker but less predictable one.

debutant.nom: Watch the opponent before you play; ask others who have played or watched him play; and experiment during the match

intermediaire.nom: Find perhaps two or three tactics that work very well, typically one on serving, one on receiving, and one in rallies.

metriques_progression: Attack his middle and wide backhand
erreurs_a_eviter: Don't get comfortable; vary your receive; don't over-power me backhand-to-backhand
